movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully perform inception.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.description: Greedy and struggling to make ends meet, a poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family by infiltrating their household.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.
